name: LD27 No more fuel!
description:
Made as ex RadStar team.

Use ESDF (I know, strange input, it was to allow both azerty and qwerty keyboard to play with the same keys) to control the rocket and land on the target.

You're in space! No friction and a lot of inertia, use your ten seconds of fuel wisely!

You can use Up and Down to zoom and dezoom view.
